page.title: 07RECREATION IN THE BUSBY AREA
page.content: People must travel outwith the area for major facilities such as sports centres and swimming pools.All of the sports facilities are privately run such as the{tennis}club in Busby. There is a private{bowling}club and the Busby Equitation Centre is popular for{horse riding.Trout fishing }is possible on the White Cart if you have a permit.Busby has an Angling Club. There are two childrens{play areas} adjacent to the council houses in Busby but the main public{open space} is Busby Glen Park at the White Cart.Here there is also a play area and footpaths which take you past a waterfall and through an attractive valley where the woodland is protected. All the sports facilities are located on the east bank of the Cart,there being none on the west bank.
